title: SJWs are quite complicated (just kidding, their behavior is extremely predictable), it requires a more nuanced perspective to truly understand them.

body:
They're authcenter. Hard auth, mild left

Auth/Lib: They believe that the government (and themselves) should be able to tell people what to do, say, and think. So auth they're near fash.

Left/Right: Generally they're for mild socialism, but they do like their Apple™ and Supreme™ and Monopolistic Tech Corporation™ overlords. They like capitalism until it harms the little people.

Where they diverge from myself is on the third axis, the 3D axis - Con/Prog. I'm a strict conservative. They're so progressive that they're now making progress *backwards* with voluntary segregation (lol). 

The political compass is a powerful tool for understanding politics.
body_html:
They're authcenter. Hard auth, mild left

Auth/Lib: They believe that the government (and themselves) should be able to tell people what to do, say, and think. So auth they're near fash.

Left/Right: Generally they're for mild socialism, but they do like their Apple™ and Supreme™ and Monopolistic Tech Corporation™ overlords. They like capitalism until it harms the little people.

Where they diverge from myself is on the third axis, the 3D axis - Con/Prog. I'm a strict conservative. They're so progressive that they're now making progress backwards with voluntary segregation (lol).

body: You're probably correct. However, I would say that SJWs advocate for a more libertarian way of dealing with their enemies. They don't want the state to step in with eliminating their adversaries, they handle that themselves with cancel culture. They are probably more to the right than I showed in my meme, but other than that they're still LeftCenter.

post.title: SJWs are quite complicated (just kidding, their behavior is extremely predictable), it requires a more nuanced perspective to truly understand them.

body:
Whether it's by the state or the mob, authoritarianism is authoritarianism. There's no mob of libertarians demanding free speech or they'll riot in your town and set your business on fire. It's only the mob. The authoritarian mob, who believe that forcing people with violence or laws is the only way to enact change.

Now, do I think that's necessarily a bad way to enact change? No. But that's a different subject. SJWs are authoritarian. Every time they get somebody fired for thinking the wrong thing, that's hardcore authoritarianism.

Now, do I think that's necessarily a bad way to enact change? No. But that's a different subject. SJWs are authoritarian. Every time they get somebody fired for thinking the wrong thing, that's hardcore authoritarianism.

body:
Good point.

I was under the impression that the Authoritarian-Libertarian axis in the Political Compass was showing how much control the government had over your life. In that case, the government isn't getting people fired or divorced, it's the people.

body: It's not just governments that the political compass describes. It's also individuals, and societies. In America, we currently have a rather libertarian government, but a rather authoritarian society. And I'm an American living in a libertarian society, but I'm a hardcore authoritarian. Governments, societies, and individuals may all lie on different areas of the compass.
body_html: It's not just governments that the political compass describes. It's also individuals, and societies. In America, we currently have a rather libertarian government, but a rather authoritarian society. And I'm an American living in a libertarian society, but I'm a hardcore authoritarian. Governments, societies, and individuals may all lie on different areas of the compass.

body:
Well, the SJWs want the government to censor any "hate speech". They are simply making do with their decentralized social media bullying campaigns, and if laws are eventually passed that prevent people from saying "hate speech", then they will be very happy. 

They're definitely AuthCenter, but leaning to the left.

body:
Leaning left, for sure. They'd also be very happy if the government controlled business, and took care of the poor, and broke up monopolies... 

Authoritarian center-left...Hmm. I feel like I've seen an ideology like that before, it's on the tip of meine Zunge, but I just can't put mein Finger on it...

body: And so you see why I don't have a horse in this race. Sure America would do well to continue the way it has been...but, if that were impossible...perhaps there's a *conservative* Auth Left solution, rather than the chaotic *progressive* Auth Left situation we're in now...Ah well, all I can do is post online about it.

Sure America would do well to continue the way it has been...but, if that were impossible...perhaps there's a conservative Auth Left solution, rather than the chaotic progressive Auth Left situation we're in now...Ah well, all I can do is post online about it.

body: No, they worship monopolies as long as they created them. Their "breaking up monopoly" and "regulating business" bullshit is just an excuse to give Apple, Disney, and Google even more power because they support their cause. "Taking care of the poor" my ass, they encourage them to rely on government welfare forever and make it very difficult for anyone to begin any kind of business activity.
